note.title: Actions to perform
note.p:
You can use the following actions:
none: no action
dump: stores the content of the mail into a file located in mail_file_directory where the filename is the messageId of the mail.
dump_attachments: stores the attachments of the mail into files located in mail_attachments_directory.
With attachment_file_name_pattern you can specify the file names.
With body_as_attachment you decide wether the body will be handled as an attachment and stored too.
You can concatenate the actions by using a semicolon *;*.
